tokenReference.title: Reference to another token
tokenReference.description: Some of the other types can reference another token or property of another token (depending on the context).

valueEscapedString.title: Escaped string value
valueEscapedString.description: For values that can be a token reference or a string, the string may need to be escaped to disambiguate it from a token reference. If the string value begins with an '@' character, then it must be escaped using a backslash ('\@'). Other '@' characters in the string do not need to be escaped in this way.

valueReferenceOrString.title: Token reference or an escaped string

tokenCommon.title: Common token properties
tokenCommon.description: Defines shared properties common to all token types.

colorValue.title: A color value
colorValue.description: A 24bit RGB color value expressed hex triplet, just like in CSS. Note, future versions of UDT may extend this value type to also allow for other color representations.

colorToken.title: A color design token
colorToken.description: A named color with an optional description text.

title: UDT file root
description: The top level of a UDT file.

meta.title: Metadata for the UDT file
meta.description: This is a mandatory section for all UDT files as it specifies which version of the UDT spec the file complies with.
